DOC.detailed_description: Gestational diabetes development diabetes pregnancy . According National Institutes Health , gestational diabetes occur 5 percent pregnancy United States , result 200,000 case year . Treatment involve dietary measure , exercise , case , insulin injection . All pregnant woman take prescribed pre-natal vitamin , also supplement fish oil another source omega-3 fatty acid help support nervous system develop child . Omega-3 fatty acid , particular Docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA ) , help pregnant woman give develop baby every advantage life start in-utero . In general omega-3 fatty acid find fish help cardiovascular system , brain ( include mood ) , even brain eye develop baby .
